post_message: CLAREMONT COLLEGES “Students Of Color” REFUSE To Live With Whites: “I don’t want to live with any white folks”…”Don’t see how this is racist at all”

commenter_a: See, it doesn't just happen on college campuses. Young men learn young that sex is their "right" and if they want it, they take it. And then the girl gets blamed.
